GSD.product_version: versions from v4.5 to before v4.14.283
GSD.description:
x86/pm: Fix false positive kmemleak report in msr_build_context()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.14.283 by commit 2a2b72ac7fb625fd1383b3a784bfd7fba93c7423, it was introduced in version v4.5 by commit 7a9c2dd08eadd5c6943115dbbec040c38d2e0822. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: x86/pm: Fix false positive kmemleak report in msr_build_context()
